titleStmt.title: A penny-worth of good counsell To widdowes, and to maides, this counsell I send free; and let them looke before they leape, or, that they married bee. To the tune of Dulcima.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Of late it was my chance to walke".
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
